content.raw:
There's a slightly different folder layout on osx. The following makes this work on my osx machine:
~~~
diff -r 207c486ddb1e cmake/gazebo-config.cmake.in
--- a/cmake/gazebo-config.cmake.in	Wed Dec 03 10:48:01 2014 -0800
+++ b/cmake/gazebo-config.cmake.in	Fri Dec 05 12:30:48 2014 -0800
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@
 
 # Add the OGRE cmake path to CMAKE_MODULE_PATH
 set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH
-  "${OGRE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/share/OGRE/cmake/modules;${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH}")
+  "${OGRE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/share/OGRE/cmake/modules;${OGRE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/CMake;${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH}")
 
 foreach(dep @PKG_DEPENDS@)
   if(NOT ${dep}_FOUND)
~~~
content.html:
There's a slightly different folder layout on osx. The following makes this work on my osx machine:

diff -r 207c486ddb1e cmake/gazebo-config.cmake.in
--- a/cmake/gazebo-config.cmake.in  Wed Dec 03 10:48:01 2014 -0800
+++ b/cmake/gazebo-config.cmake.in  Fri Dec 05 12:30:48 2014 -0800
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@

 # Add the OGRE cmake path to CMAKE_MODULE_PATH
 set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH
-  "${OGRE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/share/OGRE/cmake/modules;${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH}")
+  "${OGRE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/share/OGRE/cmake/modules;${OGRE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/CMake;${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH}")

 foreach(dep @PKG_DEPENDS@)
   if(NOT ${dep}_FOUND)
